restaurant.name: Lakeside Restaurant & Coffee Shop
restaurant.description: Operating with the School of Hospitality and Tourism Management, we offer a modern dining experience. Whether it's a leisurely meet with friends, a quick bite to eat, or to entertain that all-important business guest, Lakeside makes the ideal location for lunch.

items.description: French toast served with maple syrup and bacon

Two rashers of bacon, two sausages, two eggs, beans, mushrooms, tomato, and toast

items.description: Pancakes served with maple syrup and bacon

restaurant.name: Hillside Restaurant
restaurant.description: With a great selection of food and drink choices and more than 400 seats with a mix of modern stools and urban bench tables, Hillside is a great place to meet up, relax and enjoy some nourishing fresh food throughout your day.

restaurant.name: The Coffee Pod
restaurant.description: Artisan coffee, freshly made sandwiches, and a range of delicious cakes and pastries. The Coffee Pod is the perfect place to grab a quick bite to eat or relax with a coffee and a cake.

restaurant.name: The Burger Shack
restaurant.description: Renowned for its delicious burgers, The Burger Shack won't disappoint. From farm to fork, our burgers are made from 100% British beef and are served in a brioche bun with a side of fries.

items.description: Beef patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and burger sauce

restaurant.name: The Deli
restaurant.description: The Deli offers a range of freshly made sandwiches, salads, and snacks. With a selection of hot and cold drinks, it's the perfect place to grab a quick bite to eat.
